short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and highly customizable replacement for the default "New Tab" Page, showing current Time and customizable Quick Access Links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your default "New Tab" Page with a beautiful, minimalistic and highly customizable Version.

• Shows current Time (24 hour Format)
• Beautiful scaling for every screen size
• Customizable Quick Links
• Add your own Quick Links with your own icons
• Stopwatch and Countdown functionality
• Auto-Darkmode based on your system-preference
• Ambient-Mode (show only time when inactive for a while)
